meaning: Divine damsels such as Rambha ardently worship Her.
commentary: Divine damsels are not ordinary celestial dancers, as is commonly understood. Enjoying celestial dance actually represents a state of divine bliss that is being enjoyed by the person. Great insights about these dancers are contained in the Vedas. ‘Rambhādi वन्दिताऽ (vanditā’) implies that all the various energies in this creation worship the Divine Mother.
